item.title: Auto SSH
item.description: auto-ssh.sh :: This script will mount a auto file system using ssh and will open a ssh session with X11 Forward activated.

item.description: Internet Speed Report :: Internet Speed Report is a simple command line script that automates internet speed testing by generating graphics report in .

item.title: POC Compiler
